clue1: One of the largest hotel brands in the world.
clue2: The brand is targeted at both business and leisure travelers with locations in major city centers, near airports, convention centers, and popular vacation destinations around the world.
description: Hilton is founded by Conrad Hilton in 1919. Hilton Hotels Corporation is recognized internationally as a preeminent hospitality company. The company develops, owns, manages or franchises approximately 2,200 hotels, resorts and vacation ownership properties.The slogan is Take me to the Hilton.

clue1: It is the world's largest professional networking website.
clue2: This software help you to build connections in your industry and to stay in touch with colleagues, past and present.
description: Reid Hoffman founded Linkedin in 2003. LinkedIn is an American business- and employment-oriented online service that operates via websites and mobile apps. The slogan is Connect to Oppportunity.

clue1: It is the sixth-largest Japanese automaker and the 19th-largest worldwide by production

description: Mitsubishi Motors is founded by Iwasaki Yatarō in 1970. Mitsubishi Motors is a Japanese multinational automotive manufacturer headquartered in Minato, Tokyo, Japan. The slogan is Drive your Ambition

clue1: It is a premiere motorcycle world championship established by FIM
clue2: Grand Prix motorcycle racing is the premier class of motorcycle road racing events held on road circuits
description: The foundation of the Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme as the international governing body for motorcycle sport in 1949 provided the opportunity to coordinate rules and regulations in order that selected events could count towards official World Championships. The slogan is Ready to Race.

The slogan is One bite and you'll overrule all objections.
slogan: One bite and you'll overrule all objections.

clue1: It is a French brand of automobiles owned by Stellantis.
clue2: The world's second oldest car manufacturer and the oldest continuous car brand.
description: Armand Peugeot built the company's first car steam tricycle, in collaboration with Léon Serpollet in 1889; this was followed in 1890 by an internal combustion car with a Panhard-Daimler engine. PEUGEOT began life as an industrial manufacturer way back in 1810 – a steel foundry producing products such as band saws, umbrella frames and coffee grinders. The slogan is Motion and Emotion

description: Ray-Ban is an American-Italian brand of luxury sunglasses and eyeglasses created in 1936 by Bausch & Lomb. Ray-Ban is a leader in sun and prescription eyewear for generations providing timeless style, authenticity and premium lenses and frames. The slogan is Never hide

clue1: It is a brand of energy drinks sold by Austrian company
clue2: It is an energy drink which help to avoide tirdeness.
description: Austrian entrepreneur Dietrich Mateschitz was inspired by an existing energy drink, Krating Daeng, which was introduced in 1976 in Thailand by Chaleo Yoovidhya. He modified the ingredients to suit the tastes of Westerners,and in partnership with Chaleo, founded Red Bull GmbH in 1984 in Fuschl am See, Austria. Red Bull is a brand of energy drinks sold by Austrian company Red Bull GmbH. The slogan is Red Bull gives you wings

clue1: The brand of debit cards and prepaid cards
clue2: It is popular because of the swift services it offers &  It also offers easy cash access.
description: Mastercard Maestro is a brand of debit cards and prepaid cards owned by Mastercard that was introduced in 1991.Maestro debit cards are obtained from associate banks and are linked to the cardholder's savings account, current account or any of several other types of accounts, while prepaid cards do not require a bank account to operate. Maestro cards can be used at point of sale (POS) and ATMs.. The slogan is The new cash.
